attributes.action: To pursue the negotiations and construction of the Swansea Tidal Lagoon.
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK are calling for climate justice as seen on 20th September where 500 thousand British Children and adults striked. Swansea Bay ranges from 7-9 meters, 4 times a day, from this it’s expected the lagoon would add 316 million to the welsh economy and a further 76million every year for 120 years of action. There has been a lot of speculation over the last 5 years whether the lagoon would go ahead, we hope the government finally start the construction of Swansea Tidal lagoon!
attributes.background: We are in a climate EMERGENCY, action is required NOW. Clean energy is vital to power our nation and to become carbon neutral. Swansea tidal lagoon would benefit us all, it would power 155,000 homes, furthermore it would employ up to 3,000 people in Swansea, boosting the Welsh economy.
